properties.query:
source 'SOURCE_VAR' | fields @timestamp as timestamp, xkid, data.ProviderMetadata.Region as region, data.Provider as provider, data.Service as service, data.Action as action, replace(replace(data.Valid , "1", "true"), "0", "false") as valid
| filter msg="request" and region =~ /REGION_VAR/ and provider =~ /PROVIDER_VAR/ and service =~ /SERVICE_VAR/ and action =~ /ACTION_VAR/ and valid =~ /VALID_VAR/ and xkid =~ /XKID_VAR/ 
| sort timestamp desc 
| limit 500
properties.title: Requests

properties.query:
source 'SOURCE_VAR' | fields @timestamp as timestamp, xkid, data.ProviderMetadata.Region as region, data.Provider as provider, data.Service as service, data.Action as action, replace(replace(data.Valid , "1", "true"), "0", "false") as valid
| filter msg="request" and region =~ /REGION_VAR/ and provider =~ /PROVIDER_VAR/ and service =~ /SERVICE_VAR/ and action =~ /ACTION_VAR/ and valid =~ /VALID_VAR/ and xkid =~ /XKID_VAR/ 
| stats count() as requests by bin(1m)
properties.title: Request Count

properties.query:
source 'SOURCE_VAR' | fields @timestamp as timestamp, xkid, data.ProviderMetadata.Region as region, data.Provider as provider, data.Service as service, data.Action as action, replace(replace(data.Valid , "1", "true"), "0", "false") as valid
| filter msg="request" and region =~ /REGION_VAR/ and provider =~ /PROVIDER_VAR/ and service =~ /SERVICE_VAR/ and action =~ /ACTION_VAR/ and valid =~ /VALID_VAR/ and xkid =~ /XKID_VAR/ 
| stats count(provider) as providers by provider
| sort providers desc
| limit 10
properties.title: Providers

properties.query:
source 'SOURCE_VAR' | fields @timestamp as timestamp, xkid, data.ProviderMetadata.Region as region, data.Provider as provider, data.Service as service, data.Action as action, replace(replace(data.Valid , "1", "true"), "0", "false") as valid
| filter msg="request" and region =~ /REGION_VAR/ and provider =~ /PROVIDER_VAR/ and service =~ /SERVICE_VAR/ and action =~ /ACTION_VAR/ and valid =~ /VALID_VAR/ and xkid =~ /XKID_VAR/ 
| stats count(service) as services by service
| sort services desc
| limit 10
properties.title: Services

properties.query:
source 'SOURCE_VAR' | fields @timestamp as timestamp, xkid, data.ProviderMetadata.Region as region, data.Provider as provider, data.Service as service, data.Action as action, replace(replace(data.Valid , "1", "true"), "0", "false") as valid
| filter msg="request" and region =~ /REGION_VAR/ and provider =~ /PROVIDER_VAR/ and service =~ /SERVICE_VAR/ and action =~ /ACTION_VAR/ and valid =~ /VALID_VAR/ and xkid =~ /XKID_VAR/ 
| stats count(action) as total by provider, service, action
| sort total desc
| limit 10
properties.title: Actions

properties.query:
source 'SOURCE_VAR' | fields @timestamp as timestamp, xkid, data.ProviderMetadata.Region as region, data.Provider as provider, data.Service as service, data.Action as action, replace(replace(data.Valid , "1", "true"), "0", "false") as valid
| filter msg="request" and region =~ /REGION_VAR/ and provider =~ /PROVIDER_VAR/ and service =~ /SERVICE_VAR/ and action =~ /ACTION_VAR/ and valid =~ /VALID_VAR/ and xkid =~ /XKID_VAR/ 
| stats count(region) as total by provider, region
| sort total desc
| limit 10
properties.title: Regions
